Domenic: I've received this script `deferred` question you might have some historical insight on... is there a spec/compatibility reason to run all deferred scripts in the same task like we do? Splitting them to a-task-per-script can remove some blockage
content.formatted_body: Domenic: I've received this script deferred question you might have some historical insight on... is there a spec/compatibility reason to run all deferred scripts in the same task like we do? Splitting them to a-task-per-script can remove some blockage

content.body: In the spec we "spin the event loop" before each script, which IIUC is the equivalent of an `async await`, so adding a task barrier between steps would still be per spec (though perhaps should become the standard).
content.formatted_body: In the spec we "spin the event loop" before each script, which IIUC is the equivalent of an async await, so adding a task barrier between steps would still be per spec (though perhaps should become the standard).
